name: Coastal Theocracy
goals: Preserve purity, defend against the coming Flood, maintain monopoly on Choral material.

lore.philosophy: Oceanic Genesis: All life began in the ocean. The surface is cursed. Purity is paramount.
lore.social_structure: Rigid Hierarchy: High Ecclesiarch -> Priesthood -> Warrior Caste -> Worker Caste -> The Drowned (Outcasts).
lore.military: Defensive 'Net Line'. Uses harpoon cannons and choral-enhanced ships.

name: Sylvan Empire
goals: Endurance, slow growth, resistance to kinetic chaos.

lore.philosophy: Rooted Endurance: The forest is a single sacred entity. Patience and deep roots survive the storm.
lore.social_structure: Living Cities: Integrated into massive trees. Collective consciousness.

name: Treetop Commonwealth
goals: Strategic survival, trade, rapid adaptation to targeted chaos.

lore.philosophy: Cunning and Strategy: Chaos is a puzzle to be solved. Decentralization is defense.
lore.social_structure: Decentralized Clans: Loose alliance of independent settlements.

name: Iron Caldera
goals: Endurance against the Implacable Siege, industrial dominance.

lore.philosophy: Endurance & Unyielding Will: Pressure creates diamonds (and strong reptiles).
lore.social_structure: Caste System: Stone-Scales (Rulers) -> Lizard-Folk -> Shelled -> Salamanders. Guild-based.
